"こっちにも薬を！いたたたたっ。<br>あのやろう、直接襲ってくるだなんて……。:
"...How many years has it
been since we talked in person?"

"Hmph... Why come out of Central
after all this time?"

"I had complete faith that you all
would be able to find Dark Falz."

"So I figured I'd come to
help out an old friend of mine."

"...Once this is all over,
we can properly mourn for her."

"But, what of Central City?
Without its leader there..."

"Whenever I say I want to go exercise,
Bruder gladly takes over in my absence."
